their
request and that makes a lot of sense to

they don't get it and I realize again I

they're going to have some real concerns

it was some simple checklist but it was

but I think the big thing for me is this

oh eight or 10 years ago and I'd studied

that really helped change my life

there's a problem yeah well I don't see
a problem at all hitting that production

everybody else is they're the reason for
it but you're giving up all of your

power to do anything about it after that
you get into justification where you
start telling yourself yeah but we
always miss production dates and we
never do anything right here again
you're telling yourself stories about
why it's okay for this bad thing to

people get into shame a lot where you're

you're taking a little bit of ownership
for it but it's not healthy sometimes
you might work nights and weekends
because you feel like you're obligated

wouldn't have to do it and you're going
to work as hard as you can but
eventually get into that responsibility
mode where you get to look at the

out and you get to make a choice and
it's not responsibility as in
accountability but it's about your

it's a hard ladder to climb the
